trends: There have been no other sightings in Lamia
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: A glowing green light, turning visible out of nowhere, and taking a straight line path in tremedous speed and the dissapears again.
divs: Sighting DetailsWe were walking to home, discussing about ISON and how it will be more visible these days and we were seeing the sky and the stars. And then, over our heads straight at the sky, a glowing green light, turning visible out of nowhere, and taking a straight line path in tremedous speed and the dissapears again.
